name: Elfventure
description:
DESCIRPTION

Elfventure is a short adventure game.  Collect items and use them to progress, the goal is to find three specific items to prove you have what it takes to be a Christmas elf.

REQUIREMENTS

  • Windows XP, 7, 8 or 10
  • OS X 10.7 or newer

CONTROLS

  • Movement: WASD or Cursor keys
  • Action: SPACE or ENTER
  • menu: ESCAPE
  • Toggle full-screen: F1

Also has joypad support

UPDATES

17/12/2016 (1.0.0.1)

  1. Fixed crash bug when talking to the rabbit
  2. Changed footstep sound to be less pronounced (annoying)

17/12/2016 (1.0.0.2)

  1. Corrected some text
  2. Fixed slowdown when controllers are NOT connected
  3. Mac version uploaded
